description:
Certificate of QlikSense data visualization and analytics application development

This course is now priced to the new UDEMY price tier, enjoy the value you will receive in the course, your ROI will be many times what you paid, and while you are at it, scroll to the bottom of the page to see my other course, it covers SQL for data analytics, I teach you how to write the SQL that makes the data analyst's job easier.

Data Science and Analytics is the hot new career choice of today, but we still need an efficient and timely method to visualize what we have discovered in the morass of data in our enterprise. Thankfully we have the Qlik suite of products to help us with this and my all time favorite is QlikSense, I liked it so much, I took a leave of absence and spent 3 months developing this course for all those that want a hands on approach to learning and a certificate that showcases your technical achievement as well.

QlikSense is the next generation of QlikView.

QlikSense is overtaking so many of it's peers mostly because of it's underlying 'associative data model' technology and absolute ease of discovery for insightful decision making and story telling, and I'm certain after doing this course you will not want to revert to the old clunky ways of surfacing your analytics like you did with those products from the older monolithic vendors that will always impose their ways to your work flow and creativity.

The course of study is designed to transition your skills into a deep understanding of QlikSense app development.

I am always available to help you and answer your questions, even when you have completed the course.

Regards 

Paul
title: Certificate of QlikSense analytics development
